document_data.caption: A map showing the Dragon Gate in northeast Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Dragon Gate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragon Gate''' was one of two entry points into the portion of [[Zhentil Keep]] located on the northern banks of the [[River Tesh]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Dragon Gate was located in northeast Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. The [[Dragon Trail (Zhentil Keep)|Dragon Trail]] outside of the city merged with the [[Street of Dragons]] at the Dragon Gate.
document_data.Defenses: The gate was flanked by a pair of guard towers. Furthermore, a [[Zhentilar]] guardpost and barracks was located just inside the gate.
document_data.Activities: The Dragon Gate provided access to northeastern Zhentil Keep via the Dragon Trail.
